name: Flappy Shit
description:
This is Flappy bird except it's Shit (Literally), avoid bumping into toilet paper or water unless you wanna lose your shit XD.

This game is Just a showcase of a 2D Engine in development based on Monogame framework, I work on it solo, so consider supporting me if you like :D.

P.S: All hitboxes are rectangles, so you may find some spots irritating.
